nodes.bodyText: I think this should be the count of subnets

I originally implemented this way because we needed to know the starting and final IPs of the different ranges in order to determine the subnet types, without storing it in the database. Since it is stored now in the database, it can be changed to count.
we dont need this if we are using count
We don't need this because we are storing the subnet types
we dont need this I guess
I used PRIVATE instead of CB but the same meaning
is it ok to reffer here as a string?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -397,7 +397,8 @@ private DescribeVpcsRequest getDescribeVpcsRequestWIthFilters(Map<String, String
                             subnet.getCidrBlock(),
                             !hasInternetGateway,
                             subnet.getMapPublicIpOnLaunch(),
-                            hasInternetGateway)
+                            hasInternetGateway,
+                            "PUBLIC")
